properties.body:
STRAIT OF SICILY.
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
PANTELLERIA.
SICILY.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
1. CABLE OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 28 FEB 21
   BY M/V MSV OCEAN INTERVENTION II
   IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 37-22.99N 011-46.91E, 37-48.36N 011-51.69E,
      36-27.36N 013-24.00E, 36-05.00N 012-44.39E.
   B. 36-38.71N 014-17.97E, 36-32.35N 014-18.54E,
      36-37.66N 013-10.31E.
   C. 37-01.36N 012-03.00E, 36-52.01N 011-42.00E,
      36-32.00N 012-00.71E, 36-40.91N 012-18.00E.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 01 MAR 21.
